kesewuwada, wipathata goduru wu pa්radesha sandaha polis wishesha karya sadhaka balakaye saha tha්riwidha hamudawe athireka bhatayan yedawima pa්ramadawa sidu kota athi athara, muslim gamwasiyan owunge jiwitharakshawa sandaha pala yana atharawaraye lada kalaya pa්rayojanayata gath pa්raharakayan ema wasiyange jiwikawruththiya saha owunge depola winasha kara damime sahasika ka්riyawanhi nirathawa athi bawath sha්ri lanka manawa himikam komisama wada balana polispathiwarayata penwa deyi. ”epamanak nowa, minuwangoda, kuliyapitiya kottaramulla pa්radhana margaya wani thanwala andiri nithiya bala pawathwena kala simawa thula pawa polis bhatayan bala sitiyadima pa්raharakayan ranchu gasemin siti bawata apata boho paminili labi thibenawa” sha්ri lanka manawa himikam komisame sabhapathiniya wada balana polispathiwaya danuwath karanniya. ”apa danna paridi, sakakaruwanta erehi siwil saha deshapalana ayithiwasikam pilibanda jathyanthara sammuthi panatha -2007 (shakkchuru ්jae bhada.56 (ීැjaesadaba 3* anuwa wargika saha aagamika pa්rachanda ka්riyawan awussa lima thahanam ka්riyawak wana athara, ewani ka්riyawan sambandhayen athadanguwata ganu labana sakakaruwan apa niyama kala hakiwanne mahadhikaranayata pamani.

aththatama me thunwana parshawayata wahana pawarima dan peratath wada ihala gihillayi thiyenne.samagam nitharama uthsaha karanne me thunwana parshawaye pawarim awama mattamaka thaba ganimatayi.kothek uthsaha kalath atorni balapatha nithiya idiriye walangu na kiyala therum karala denna adala parshawaya palamu parshawaya wishwasa bawa kiyamin nawa giwisumakata paminima magaharinne nawa giwisum gatha wimedi wahana liyapadinchiya ha samagamata gewimata siduwana gasthuwa nogewa inna.mewani pawarim waladi thunwana parshawaya itha ihala awadanamak ganne.thunwana parshawaya warika siyalla gewa awasan wu pasu palamu parshawaya illimak kaloth adala liyakiyawili ohuta bara dena lesa mama hithanne samagamata wunath sidda wenawa palamu parshawayata eewa laba dimata.
